name: code-review
description: Perform automated code review on a file or directory
author: TinyClaw Examples

inputs.name: target_path
inputs.description: Path to file or directory to review

steps.prompt: Review this {language} code from {target_path}. Provide: 1) Code quality assessment 2) Potential bugs or issues 3) Security concerns 4) Performance suggestions 5) Style and best practice recommendations
